dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents rivers in Papua New Guinea. This layer is part of Global Map Papua New Guinea version 2.0Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
Papua New Guinea. National Mapping Bureau
